description: This file handles server-side rendering requests in a Remix application, differentiating between bot and browser requests, setting appropriate response headers, and rendering React components into streams for HTTP responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry point that processes incoming requests, sets CORS headers, and delegates to specific handlers based on whether the request is from a bot or a browser.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server rendering for bot requests using React's streaming server API.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server rendering for browser requests using React's streaming server API.
